quotes.quote: Let the sun shine on me, for I care not for the moon
Don't let the shadows of yesterday spoil the sunshine of tomorrow. Live for today.
Most of the shadows of this life are caused by our standing in one's own sunshine.
Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces us up, snow is exhilarating; there is really no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
Today, give a stranger one of your smiles. It might be the only sunshine he sees all day.
Those who bring sunshine to the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.
If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you will never see the shadow.
It is the artist's business to create sunshine when the sun fails.
Sunshine is a welcome thing. It brings a lot of brightness.
There is no investment you can make which will pay you so well as the effort to scatter sunshine and good cheer through your establishment.
Some people are so much sunshine to the square inch.
He that will enjoy the brightness of sunshine, must quit the coolness of the shade.
Not in sorrow freely is never to open the bosom to the sweets of the sunshine.
If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm.
The sun lay like a friendly arm across her shoulder.
Sunshine all the time makes a desert.
Before you let the sun in, mind it wipes its shoes.
You've got to get out and pray to the sky to appreciate the sunshine; otherwise you're just a lizard standing there with the sun shining on you.
Faith is the virtue of the storm, just as happiness is the virtue of sunshine.
It is eternity now. I am in the midst of it. It is about me and the sunshine.
Far away there in the sunshine are my brightest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them and try to follow where they lead.
Just living is not enough...one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
A cloudy day is no match for a sunny disposition.
Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air's salubrity.
The sun does not shine for a few trees and flowers, but for the wide world's joy.
A light wind swept over the corn, and all nature laughed in the sunshine.
The world goes up and the world goes down, the sunshine follows the rain; and yesterday's sneer and yesterday's frown can never come over again.
Make use of the sun while it shines.
